comprehensive_overview: The R Studioapi package provides an interface to the RStudio IDE's API, allowing users to interact with the IDE programmatically. It enables users to extract information about projects, sessions, source code, UI state, and more from the RStudio IDE environment.
core_features: Access the RStudio IDE API programmatically
Retrieve information about projects, sessions, source code, and UI state
Interact with RStudio IDE features using R code
